name: Juvuk's Island Adventure
description:
This is a game dedicated to a small portion of the people who have helped me get this far in game development!

To everyone who has played ,play tested, gave feedback on any of my games and supported me with encouragement Thank you!

  • move from your home island to find others and invite them back to your island to live.

made by 1 person in 3 weeks!

W,A,S,D for movement Space to Interact.

Sorry about Camera/Movement ( Slowly working on it)
